description: Plexian AB engages in the provision of electronic payment and loyalty system. The company is headquartered in Malmo, Skane. The company went IPO on 2021-04-14. The Company’s business is to offer services and products that aim to increase loyalty through analysis of customers' surroundings and actions. Plexian AB (publ) operates in the segments Electronic Payments and sales-driven loyalty solutions. The firm has developed the payment platform Edge Visa based on business opportunities created through Open Banking. Plexian's business model is based on converting existing members of partner companies with member databases, such as Fitness24Seven with whom Plexian has entered into an agreement, into users of the self-developed payment card Edge Visa. Edge connects consumers with businesses. The platform provides smart payment and loyalty card, combined with an app that is filled with consumer offers.
naics: Data Processing, Hosting, and Related Services

name: Plexian AB
